INSERT INTO account_batch(
outflow_accountid,
inflow_accountid,
ra_batch,
fin_batch,
sum,
reason_id,
remark,
flow_amount,
status,
operator_id,
create_time,
update_time,
platform_id,
type,
company_id,
currency_type,
) VALUES (
#{outflowAccountid},
#{inflowAccountid},
#{raBatch},
#{finBatch},
#{sum},
#{reasonId},
#{remark},
#{flowAmount},
#{status},
#{operatorId},
#{createTime},
#{updateTime},
#{platformId},
#{type},
#{companyId},
#{currencyType},
)
select LAST_INSERT_ID()
mapper.update:
UPDATE account_batch
outflow_accountid=#{outflowAccountid},
inflow_accountid=#{inflowAccountid},
ra_batch = #{raBatch},
fin_batch = #{finBatch},
sum = #{sum},
reason_id = #{reasonId},
remark = #{remark},
flow_amount = #{flowAmount},
status = #{status},
operator_id = #{operatorId},
create_time = #{createTime},
update_time = #{updateTime},
platform_id=#{platformId},
type=#{type},
company_id=#{companyId},
currency_type=#{currencyType},
WHERE id = #{id}
